thread.title: Perfect NYC adventure campsite!!
thread.title_full: Perfect NYC adventure campsite!! - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Skibumdude
title: Perfect NYC adventure campsite!!
text: This is an awesome historic hotel wonderfully close to Times Square, Rockefeller Center and Bryant Park. We have probably stayed at a dozen hotels around Times Square and this is by far the most delightful. Our room was spacious and extremely comfortable. The staff are friendly; the hotel is super clean; and the location is unbeatable. We had great wi-fi. This is a wonderful hotel is unbeatable, and we would never hesitate to stay here again.
